Rosehill TPV® combines durability, reliability, and UV stability to create high-quality, long-lasting surfaces.

Our Products

Cutting-edge solutions manufactured in the UK using premium virgin polymers

Rosehill TPV Granules

Cutting-edge, elastomer-based coloured rubber granules manufactured in the United Kingdom. Our unique, 100% fully cross-linked and non-porous granules are polypropylene-free and non-spherical.

  • Premium virgin polymers - no sulphur, clay fillers, or heavy metals
  • Remarkable thermal stability with no carbon black leaching
  • Maintains suppleness under harsh UV conditions
  • Superior colour consistency across all 21 vibrant colours
  • Enhanced UV stability compared to EPDM and SBR granules
  • Custom colour blending service available
View Product Details

Flexilon® Binders

Comprehensive range of cleaners, primers, binders, catalysts and pigments for both hot and cold moulding applications. With over 30 years of experience developing MDI polyurethane binders, our Flexilon® range offers solutions for every climate and condition.

  • 30+ years of MDI polyurethane binder development
  • Solutions for all climates and conditions
  • Hot and cold moulding applications
  • Complete system including cleaners and primers
  • Proven performance in demanding environments
  • Technical support and guidance included
Learn More

Applications

Versatile solutions for sports, recreation, and safety surfacing across diverse environments

Playground Surfaces

Safe, non-slip surfaces for children's play areas with excellent impact absorption and vibrant colour options.

Multi-Use Games Areas

Durable court surfaces suitable for basketball, tennis, netball and other sports with superior UV resistance.

Running Tracks

High-performance athletic track surfaces providing optimal grip, comfort, and longevity for competitive sports.

Sports Pitches

Synthetic turf and pitch surfaces with excellent drainage and consistent playing characteristics year-round.

Footpaths

Slip-resistant pathway surfaces ideal for parks, trails, and public spaces with low maintenance requirements.

Splash Parks

Water-resistant surfaces perfect for water play areas, providing safety and comfort in wet conditions.

About Rosehill Sports & Play

Market-leading manufacturer with global recognition and trust

UK Manufacturing

State-of-the-art facilities in Yorkshire using unique polyurethane chemistry, tailor-made for the toughest environments.

Global Recognition

Specified by architects and designers worldwide, from Olympic Games venues to Disney, Sea World, and Universal Studios.

Innovation & R&D

Continuous innovation driven by talented polymer scientists and extensive research capabilities.

Quality Assured

Rigorous quality control procedures with comprehensive testing ensuring consistent, high-quality outputs.
